bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style: {\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '人气',
    '更新',
    '评分',
    '收藏'
];
orderby = [
    '&orderby=click',
    '&orderby=date',
    '&orderby=score',
    '&orderby=shoucang'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${orderby[i]}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
kind = [
    '全部','热血','机战','运动','推理','冒险','搞笑','战争',
    '神魔','忍者','竞技','悬疑','社会','恋爱','宠物','吸血',
    '萝莉','后宫','御姐','霸总','玄幻','古风','历史','漫改',
    '游戏','穿越','恐怖','真人','科幻','都市','武侠','修真',
    '生活','动作'
];
link = [
    '','rexue','jizhan','yundong','tuili','maoxian','gaoxiao','zhanzhen',
    'shenmo','renzhe','jingji','xuanyi','shehui','lianai','chongwu','xixue',
    'luoli','hougong','yujie','bazong','xuanhuan','gufeng','lishi','mangai',
    'youxi','chuanyue','kongbu','zhenren','kehuan','dushi','wuxia','xiuzhen',
    'shenghuo','dongzuo'
];
for (j in kind) {
    OrderBy = `{{get('orderBy',Get('o'))}}`;
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=${link[j]}${OrderBy}&search_type=&search_key=&page={{page}}&size=48`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
exploreUrl.splice(40, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
exploreUrl.splice(41, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  /*{
    name: "                  设置填写的序号为当前源站序号                  ",
    type: "button",
    action: "$()"
  },
  { name: "序号：", type: "text" },*/
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 测　　 试　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test(1)"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(-1)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换排序  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "  人气 ", type: "button", action: "o(0)" },
  { name: "  更新  ", type: "button", action: "o(1)" },
  { name: "  评分  ", type: "button", action: "o(2)" },
  { name: "  收藏 ", type: "button", action: "o(3)" },

  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var list = JSON.parse(result).data; var $2 = element => String(java.getElements(element).text()); var $3 = element => java.getElements(element); url = baseUrl; s = '✦ ' + Num(list.renqi) + ',' + '♥ ' + Num(list.shoucang); k = (list.comic_status < 2 ? '连载,' : '完结,') + Object.values(list.comic_type).join(','); t = String(java.timeFormat(list.update_time*1000)); l = list.last_chapter_name; l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; num = "⓪①②③④⑤⑥⑦⑧⑨⑩⑪⑫⑬⑭⑮⑯⑰⑱⑲⑳" x = ['人气','更新','评分','收藏']; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + num[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 25 ? Get('url').substring(0, 25) + "
" + Get('url').substring(25) : Get('url')) + ('\n📚当前排序：〖' + (Get('o') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + x[Get('o')]) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': list.comic_name, 'author': list.comic_author, 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + list.comic_desc.replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') + changeLog, 'cover': list.cover_list[0] + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'] }); } Put(book);

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).data.data;
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = list[i].comic_name;
        author = String(list[i].comic_author).replace(/\|/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+|(\s+)(?=\W)/g, '$1/$2');
        kind = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].renqi) + ',' + '♥ ' + Num(list[i].shoucang) + ',' + (list[i].comic_grade === '0' ? '完结' : '连载') + ',' + String(list[i].comic_type).replace(/[a-zA-Z]|\|/g,'');
        latest = (baseUrl.includes("sort=&") && !baseUrl.includes("=date")) ? list[i].last_chapter_name : (list[i].last_chapter_name + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].update_time)).replace(/\//g, '-').replace(/\s.*/g, '') + '〕');
        intro = list[i].cartoon_desc;
        requestid = java.md5Encode('/comic-api/v2/comic/getcomicmaindatacomic_id=' + list[i].comic_id + '&young_mode=0&from_page=other&platformname=android&productname=kmherciyuan2020');
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest,
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': list[i].cover_img + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option),
            'url': 'https://api-cdn.kaimanhua.com/comic-api/v2/comic/getcomicmaindata?comic_id=' + list[i].comic_id + '&young_mode=0&from_page=other&platformname=android&productname=kmh,{"headers":{"m-request-id":"' + requestid + '"}}'
        });
    }
    if (!baseUrl.includes("page")) {
        Data();
    } else {
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/page=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'page=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.data[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var id = JSON.parse(result).data.comic_id;
    var list = JSON.parse(result).data.comic_chapter;
    var $1 = element => String(java.getElements(element).attr('content'));
    var date = String(java.timeFormat(list[0].create_date*1000));
    for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        title = list[i].chapter_name;
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        title = String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/(.*?[话話章回期])\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/\s\s/g, ' ')
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? (title + '〔' + date + '〕') : title,
            'link': Get('url') + '/api/getchapterinfov2?product_id=2&productname=kmh&platformname=wap&comic_id=' + id + '&chapter_newid='+ list[i].chapter_id +'&isWebp=1&quality=high',
            'time': String(java.timeFormat(list[i].create_date*1000))
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    return Get('url') + '/api/getsortlist/?comic_sort=&orderby=date&search_type=&search_key=' + e + '&page={{page}}&size=48';
}(key));
